feed.title: Mattermost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.10.1
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 10.10.1 contains multiple new quality of life improvements, including Shared Direct/Group Messages, LDAP Wizard​, and AI-enhanced Search (experimental)​.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v9.11.18
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Extended Support Release 9.11.18 contains low to medium severity level security fixes.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.5.9
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Extended Support Release 10.5.9 contains low to medium severity level security fixes.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.8.4
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 10.8.4 contains medium severity level security fixes.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.9.4
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 10.9.4 contains medium severity level security fixes.
